select from post p left join post_company company on p.compID = company.id left join localtioninfo workPlace on p.addrID = workPlace.id left join city city on workPlace.cityID = city.id and city.id = #{condition.cityType} and p.postType = #{condition.fullType} ${condition.salaryOrder} ${condition.orderBy} order by p.createTime desc

select , IFNULl(sum(b.version),0) as 'browser' from post p left join browserecord b on p.id = b.browseID and b.browseType = 2 left join post_company company on p.compID = company.id left join localtioninfo workPlace on p.addrID = workPlace.id left join city city on workPlace.cityID = city.id AND p.id != #{condition.other} AND p.id is not null GROUP BY p.id ${orderByClause}
